Welcome to The Bifrost’s documentation!

A bridge to move your data structures across different programming languages

This is an open-source suite of mini-libraries designed to connect array data between Python and C++ through the use of JSON files. Python and C++ modules use tojson and jsonload functions to convert [one- two- and three-dimensional] arrays to .json DOK (Dictionary of Keys) and viceversa, respectively

Check out the Usage section for further information, including how to Installation the project.

Note

This project is under active development.
